attributes.Detailed: This is the Vanderbilt Aerospace Design Lab's (VADL) Autonomous Ground Support Equipment (AGSE) robot code which performed a simulated Mars Sample Recovery (MSR) mission by autonomously finding and placing a Martian sample into a rocket before launch.  This project contains the software model, hardware model, and algorithms for the AGSE.
attributes.name: AGSE

attributes.Detailed: This project contains the code and models for network traffic light controllers which receive sensor data from inductive loop sensors and send actuator commands to traffic lights based on their control logic and parameters.  These sensors and actuators (as well as the actual cars in the traffic network) are simulated using the Simulation of Urban Mobility (SUMO) simulator.  This code uses the TraCIAPI in lib-sumo to send and receive data to/from the simulation.
attributes.name: Traffic Light Controller
